statements: SELECT * FROM joint_movements_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM joint_movements_data WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT z_coordinate FROM joint_movements_data WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM joint_movements_data WHERE z_coordinate > 0.5
SELECT id, timestamp FROM joint_movements_data WHERE x_coordinate < 0.0 AND y_coordinate < 0.0
SELECT id, user_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate, timestamp FROM joint_movements_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM joint_movements_data WHERE x_coordinate > 50 AND y_coordinate < 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, timestamp, x_coordinate FROM joint_movements_data WHERE z_coordinate BETWEEN 10 AND 20 AND user_id IN (3, 4, 7) ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(x_coordinate) AS max_x FROM joint_movements_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING max_x > 100 ORDER BY max_x DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS Num_of_Records FROM joint_movements_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY Num_of_Records DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM JointMovementsData;
SELECT participant_id, joint_name, x_coordinate FROM JointMovementsData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM MotionAnalysisStudies WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT participant_id, joint_name, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM JointMovementsData WHERE joint_name = 'knee';
SELECT * FROM MotionAnalysisStudies ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM JointMovementsData WHERE participant_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM MotionAnalysisStudies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT joint_name, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM JointMovementsData WHERE x_coordinate > 0 AND y_coordinate < 0 ORDER BY joint_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT participant_id) AS total_participants FROM JointMovementsData;
SELECT study_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, start_date, end_date) AS study_duration_in_days FROM MotionAnalysisStudies WHERE study_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM movements_data;
SELECT movement_name, movement_type FROM movements_data WHERE movement_id = 1;
SELECT movement_name, recorded_at FROM movements_data ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, weight FROM user_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT result_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis_results WHERE result_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM movements_data ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, age, weight FROM user_data WHERE age > 30 AND weight <= 70;
SELECT movement_name, movement_type FROM movements_data WHERE movement_type = 'Strength' AND movement_name LIKE '%Squat%' ORDER BY movement_id ASC;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result->'accuracy' AS accuracy FROM analysis_results WHERE user_id = 101 AND result_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_data.user_name, movements_data.movement_name, analysis_date FROM user_data INNER JOIN movements_data ON user_data.user_id = movements_data.user_id ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT motion_name, description FROM motions WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM joint_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, analysis_date, result FROM analysis_results WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT motion_name, description FROM motions WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;

SELECT users.username, motions.motion_name, joint_name, joint_angle FROM joint_data INNER JOIN users ON joint_data.user_id = users.user_id INNER JOIN motions ON joint_data.motion_id = motions.motion_id;
SELECT user_id, motion_name, analysis_date FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, participant_id, timestamp, joint_name, x_position, y_position FROM joint_movements_data;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT study_name, start_date, location FROM motion_analysis_studies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, field_of_study, leader_id FROM research_team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT result_id, motion_quality, duration_seconds FROM test_results WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM joint_movements_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY x_position ASC, y_position DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT participant_id, joint_name, x_position, y_position FROM joint_movements_data WHERE joint_name LIKE '%elbow%' AND x_position > 0.5;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM motion_analysis_studies WHERE location = 'Lab A' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT team_name, leader_id, field_of_study FROM research_team WHERE leader_id IN (SELECT id FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Female');
